source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 769,864 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 315,051.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Sleeveless T-Shirt
description: On the inside collar it reads, 'Inspected by Earl Z. Moade.'

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 407 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 421 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 74,301 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 168,875.
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: G3T-00t
description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,345 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
